website_summaries.verdict: One of the best versatile tires focused on comfort and suspension on or off the road.
pros: Tightly packed lugs create a uniform tread pattern meant to float above mud and debris more than other all-terrain tires
Tight pattern also keeps highway performance up
Exceptional control when maneuvering in mud and other terrain
cons: Tires produce a loud rumble at high speeds

customer_reviews.title: Off-road they're awesome. Mud
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put many miles on these yet, but they've exceeded my expectations so far. I got them in 31" size for my Jeep Cherokee. On road they are quiet for how aggressive the tread is, and they balanced well. Off-road they're awesome. Mud, rock, loose dirt....as long as a wheel is on the ground they have traction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for off road a little slick when on really wet roads.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for my Jeep
customer_reviews.text: These are great in the mud and in the snow. I keep them on my Jeep year round, and they are wearing well and should last. Not a lot of noise on the highway for a wide channel tire.
customer_reviews.author: Korecky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble balancing them. Garage said they were most likely seconds. Have about 1000 miles on them and so far okay.
customer_reviews.author: Butters

customer_reviews.title: Least noise of mud tires out there.  This is my 3rd set in 15 years.
customer_reviews.text: Great mud tread and very quiet to be what they are. Amazon had the best price too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: Great tires and received them just a few days after ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Good Year.tires are the best tires out there.  Pure quality
customer_reviews.text: Tires look great and you well know Good Year Tires the best tires out there
customer_reviews.author: Juan  Obeso

customer_reviews.title: Goodyear DuraTrac
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires for my Jeep Wrangler. The jeep is my daily driver. But, I do a little off roading and wanted a tire that could do it all. And, These tires did great in the mud last weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: American Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality American made tire. Many rough Rocky mountain miles ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tire
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tire... that I accidentally bought for $200. :/ I haven't actually driven on it, but it really looks like a fantastic tire.
customer_reviews.author: J.Murica

customer_reviews.title: they look great. saw some friends that have them and got ...
customer_reviews.text: they look great. saw some friends that have them and got nothing but great feed back. have not mounted them yet so when i do on my 2001 jeep wrangler i will visit amazon and comment
customer_reviews.author: michael j. borchetta

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic savings!  Fast and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how simple buying tires thru amazon was! Fresh tires, fast delivery. I was able to have them mounted and balanced for only $10.00 each. Awesome savings all the way around! I since have recommend to my family and friends this fantastic way to buy tires and save $$$MONEY$$$.
customer_reviews.author: G40Chief

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all-around tire
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2001 Jeep wrangler TJ sport and I've been looking for a really good tire for both on and off the road. Don't look any further. These tires are amazing. The grip on the road is great, and quiet. While there off road performance is superb. I have done about a year worth of research, and comparison and I have never regretted the buy. I fully recommend this tire and will probably by this tire for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Noisy on Xterra
customer_reviews.text: Put on 2005 Xterra and the ride and grip were great but the noise on highway unbearable, so took them off and sold them; reviews of being quiet on Jeeps have me asking if it is a better application or weight because they were load enough to be annoying. Now shopping for replacements for some half worn Michelins that are very quiet but lack the the wet road traction and in turn stability.
customer_reviews.author: Carsonpass

product_meta.title: Goodyear Wrangler DuraTrac Radial - 31X10.50R15LT 109Q
product_meta.description: As one of the most trusted names in the tire business, Goodyear Tires has an ongoing legacy of success and a reputation for quality tires and satisfied drivers.
